name: Minima16: Every Which Way But Up
name_original: Minima16: Every Which Way But Up
description:
Summary:

Guide Laz as he rescues civilians caught in the middle of an alien attack in this disorientating shooter.

Run and fire to survive. Jump to dodge. Double jump to reach for other planets.

Minima?

Minima is my series of games that focus on a single game mechanic. Due to time constraints the presentation of these games is fairly ... minimal.

This is my 16th Minima game ("bitesize nuggets of gaming fun!") and my February entry for #1GAM.

If you enjoyed this then why not go to my website for more gaming snacks made for my own amusement. Thanks.
